articles.author: Chloe Whelan
articles.title: Shock as cricket legend jailed for 10 years
articles.description: A retired cricket legend has been sentenced to 10 years in jail, accused of leaking state secrets in a years-long political crisis.
articles.content:
A retired cricket legend has been sentenced to 10 years in jail, accused of leaking state secrets in a years-long political crisis.

articles.title: Pakistani court convicts jailed ex-Prime Minister Imran Khan of revealing secrets ahead of elections
articles.description: ISLAMABAD (AP) — A Pakistani court convicted former Prime Minister Imran Khan of revealing official secrets on Tuesday and sentenced him to 10 years — the latest in a slew of legal cases that supporters say are meant to sideline the imprisoned former cricket …
